| <span data-ttu-id="b285c-631">Дополнение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b285c-631">Addition</span></span>        | <span data-ttu-id="b285c-632">бета</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b285c-632">Beta</span></span>        | <span data-ttu-id="b285c-633">Добавлен ресурс [call](/graph/api/resources/call?view=graph-rest-beta) для управления голосовыми и видеозвонками (изначально в Microsoft Teams), включая API для [создания звонков](/graph/api/application-post-calls?view=graph-rest-beta), [получения звонка](/graph/api/call-get?view=graph-rest-beta), [удаления (завершения) звонка](/graph/api/call-delete?view=graph-rest-beta), [ответа на звонок](/graph/api/call-answer?view=graph-rest-beta), [отклонения звонка](/graph/api/call-reject?view=graph-rest-beta), [перенаправления звонка](/graph/api/call-redirect?view=graph-rest-beta) и [ передачи звонка](/graph/api/call-transfer?view=graph-rest-beta).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b285c-633">Added the [call](/graph/api/resources/call?view=graph-rest-beta) resource for managing audio/video calls (initially, in Microsoft Teams), including APIs for [creating calls](/graph/api/application-post-calls?view=graph-rest-beta), [retrieving a a call](/graph/api/call-get?view=graph-rest-beta), [deleting (hanging up) a call](/graph/api/call-delete?view=graph-rest-beta), [answering a call](/graph/api/call-answer?view=graph-rest-beta), [rejecting a call](/graph/api/call-reject?view=graph-rest-beta), [redirecting a call](/graph/api/call-redirect?view=graph-rest-beta), and [transferring a call](/graph/api/call-transfer?view=graph-rest-beta).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b285c-634">Мы также расширили API для поддержки [сценариев IVR](/graph/api/resources/calls-api-ivr-overview?view=graph-rest-beta): [воспроизведение запроса](/graph/api/call-playprompt?view=graph-rest-beta), [запись звонка](/graph/api/call-record?view=graph-rest-beta), [отмена обработки мультимедиа](/graph/api/call-cancelmediaprocessing?view=graph-rest-beta) и [подписка на тональные уведомления](/graph/api/call-subscribetotone?view=graph-rest-beta).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b285c-634">We've also added APIs to support [IVR scenarios](/graph/api/resources/calls-api-ivr-overview?view=graph-rest-beta): [playing a prompt](/graph/api/call-playprompt?view=graph-rest-beta), [recording a call](/graph/api/call-record?view=graph-rest-beta), [cancel media processing](/graph/api/call-cancelmediaprocessing?view=graph-rest-beta), and [subscribing to touch tone notifications](/graph/api/call-subscribetotone?view=graph-rest-beta).</span></span> |
| <span data-ttu-id="b285c-635">Дополнение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b285c-635">Addition</span></span>        | <span data-ttu-id="b285c-636">бета</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b285c-636">Beta</span></span>        | <span data-ttu-id="b285c-637">Добавлен ресурс [participant](/graph/api/resources/call?view=graph-rest-beta) и API для управления участниками в голосовых и видеозвонках и собраниях, в том числе [получение объекта participant](/graph/api/participant-get?view=graph-rest-beta), [настройка звукового микшера для участника](/graph/api/participant-configuremixer?view=graph-rest-beta), отключение звука [одного](/graph/api/participant-mute?view=graph-rest-beta) или [всех](/graph/api/participant-muteall?view=graph-rest-beta) участников, [получение списка участников](/graph/api/call-list-participants?view=graph-rest-beta) в звонке или собрании и [приглашение участников](/graph/api/participant-invite?view=graph-rest-beta) в звонок или собрание.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b285c-637">Added the [participant](/graph/api/resources/call?view=graph-rest-beta) resource and APIs for managing the participants in audio/video calls and meetings, including [retrieving a participant object](/graph/api/participant-get?view=graph-rest-beta), [configuring the audio mixer for a participant](/graph/api/participant-configuremixer?view=graph-rest-beta), muting [one](/graph/api/participant-mute?view=graph-rest-beta) or [all](/graph/api/participant-muteall?view=graph-rest-beta) of the participants, [retrieving a list of the participants](/graph/api/call-list-participants?view=graph-rest-beta) in a call/meeting, and [inviting participants](/graph/api/participant-invite?view=graph-rest-beta) to a call/meeting.</span></span> |
| <span data-ttu-id="b285c-638">Дополнение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b285c-638">Addition</span></span>        | <span data-ttu-id="b285c-639">бета</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b285c-639">Beta</span></span>        | <span data-ttu-id="b285c-640">Добавлены API для приложений по управлению и участию в звонках и собраниях, включая возможность [делиться контентом](/graph/api/call-changescreensharingrole?view=graph-rest-beta), [самостоятельно отключать и включать звук](/graph/api/call-unmute?view=graph-rest-beta) и [обновлять метаданные, связанные со звонком](/graph/api/call-updatemetadata?view=graph-rest-beta).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b285c-640">Added APIs for applications to manage and participate in calls and meetings, including the ability to [share content](/graph/api/call-changescreensharingrole?view=graph-rest-beta), [mute and unmute itself](/graph/api/call-unmute?view=graph-rest-beta), and [update the metadata associated with a call](/graph/api/call-updatemetadata?view=graph-rest-beta).</span></span> |
| <span data-ttu-id="b285c-641">Дополнение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b285c-641">Addition</span></span>        | <span data-ttu-id="b285c-642">бета</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b285c-642">Beta</span></span>        | <span data-ttu-id="b285c-643">Добавлен ресурс [audio routing group](/graph/api/resources/audioroutinggroup?view=graph-rest-beta) и API для управления частными звуковыми маршрутами между участниками многосторонней беседы, включая [создание групп маршрутизации звука](/graph/api/call-post-audioroutinggroups?view=graph-rest-beta), [получение их списка](/graph/api/audioroutinggroup-get?view=graph-rest-beta), а также их [обновление](/graph/api/audioroutinggroup-update?view=graph-rest-beta) и [удаление](/graph/api/audioroutinggroup-delete?view=graph-rest-beta).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b285c-643">Added the [audio routing group](/graph/api/resources/audioroutinggroup?view=graph-rest-beta) resource and APIs for managing private audio routes between participants in a multiparty conversation, including [creating audio routing groups](/graph/api/call-post-audioroutinggroups?view=graph-rest-beta), [retrieving a list of them](/graph/api/audioroutinggroup-get?view=graph-rest-beta), and [updating](/graph/api/audioroutinggroup-update?view=graph-rest-beta) and [deleting](/graph/api/audioroutinggroup-delete?view=graph-rest-beta) them.</span></span> |
| <span data-ttu-id="b285c-644">Дополнение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b285c-644">Addition</span></span>        | <span data-ttu-id="b285c-645">бета</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b285c-645">Beta</span></span>        | <span data-ttu-id="b285c-646">Добавлен ресурс [online meeting](/graph/api/resources/audioroutinggroup?view=graph-rest-beta) и API для управления собраниями по сети Microsoft Teams.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b285c-646">Added the [online meeting](/graph/api/resources/audioroutinggroup?view=graph-rest-beta) resource and APIs for managing Microsoft Teams online meetings.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b285c-647">Изначально существует только один API для собраний по сети для [получения объекта online meeting](/graph/api/onlinemeeting-get?view=graph-rest-beta).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b285c-647">Initially, there is only one API for online meetings, to [retrieve an online meeting object](/graph/api/onlinemeeting-get?view=graph-rest-beta).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b285c-648">Также был добавлен соответствующий ресурс для [сведений об аудиоконференции](/graph/api/resources/audioconferencing?view=graph-rest-beta), связанный с собранием (например, URL-адрес телефонного подключения, секретные коды и номера телефонов).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b285c-648">A related resource for the [audio conference information](/graph/api/resources/audioconferencing?view=graph-rest-beta) associated with a meeting (e.g. dial-in URL, passcodes, and phone numbers) was also added.</span></span> |
| <span data-ttu-id="b285c-649">Дополнение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b285c-649">Addition</span></span>        | <span data-ttu-id="b285c-650">бета</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b285c-650">Beta</span></span>        | <span data-ttu-id="b285c-651">Выполнение многих из API звонков и собраний занимает длительное время, поэтому были добавлены ресурсы для этих продолжительных операций: [операции, предназначенные для звонков](/graph/api/resources/commsoperation?view=graph-rest-beta), [воспроизведение аудио запросов](/graph/api/resources/playpromptoperation?view=graph-rest-beta) и [ запись](/graph/api/resources/recordoperation?view=graph-rest-beta).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b285c-651">Many of the calls and meetings APIs take time to complete, so resources for these long-running operations were added: [calling-specific operations](/graph/api/resources/commsoperation?view=graph-rest-beta), [playing audio prompts](/graph/api/resources/playpromptoperation?view=graph-rest-beta), and [recording](/graph/api/resources/recordoperation?view=graph-rest-beta).</span></span>  |

### <a name="directory-apis"></a><span data-ttu-id="b285c-980">API каталогов</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b285c-980">Directory APIs</span></span>

| <span data-ttu-id="b285c-981">**Тип изменения**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b285c-981">**Change type**</span></span> | <span data-ttu-id="b285c-982">**Версия**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b285c-982">**Version**</span></span>   | <span data-ttu-id="b285c-983">**Описание**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b285c-983">**Description**</span></span>                          |
| :-------------- | :------------ | :--------------------------------------- |
| <span data-ttu-id="b285c-984">Дополнение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b285c-984">Addition</span></span> | <span data-ttu-id="b285c-985">1.0</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b285c-985">v1.0</span></span> | <span data-ttu-id="b285c-986">Добавлено свойство isMultipleDataLocationsForServicesEnabled в ресурс [Organization](/graph/api/resources/organization?view=graph-rest-beta), позволяющее приложениям проверять, включена ли для клиента поддержка нескольких регионов.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b285c-986">Added  isMultipleDataLocationsForServicesEnabled property to [Organization](/graph/api/resources/organization?view=graph-rest-beta) resource that allows apps to verify that tenant is enabled for Multi-Geo capabilities.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b285c-987">Добавлено свойство preferredDataLocation в ресурсы [user](/graph/api/resources/user?view=graph-rest-beta) и [group](/graph/api/resources/group?view=graph-rest-beta), позволяющее настраивать предпочтительное расположение данных для пользователя и группы.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b285c-987">Added preferredDataLocation property to [user](/graph/api/resources/user?view=graph-rest-beta) and [group](/graph/api/resources/group?view=graph-rest-beta) resources that allow setting preferred data location for a user and group.</span></span>|
| <span data-ttu-id="b285c-988">Дополнение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b285c-988">Addition</span></span> | <span data-ttu-id="b285c-989">1.0</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b285c-989">v1.0</span></span> | <span data-ttu-id="b285c-990">Добавлено свойство [onPremisesProvisioningErrors](/graph/api/resources/onpremisesprovisioningerror?view=graph-rest-1.0) в объекты [User](/graph/api/resources/user?view=graph-rest-1.0) и [Group](/graph/api/resources/group?view=graph-rest-1.0), представляющее ошибки синхронизации службы каталогов при синхронизации локальных каталогов с Azure Active Directory с использованием продукта синхронизации Майкрософт (включая Azure AD Connect, DirSync и MIM + соединитель).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b285c-990">Added  [onPremisesProvisioningErrors](/graph/api/resources/onpremisesprovisioningerror?view=graph-rest-1.0) property to the [User](/graph/api/resources/user?view=graph-rest-1.0) and [Group](/graph/api/resources/group?view=graph-rest-1.0) entities that represents directory synchronization errors when synchronizing on-premises directories to Azure Active Directory when using Microsoft synchronization product (including Azure AD Connect, DirSync and MIM + Connector).</span></span>|
| <span data-ttu-id="b285c-991">Дополнение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b285c-991">Addition</span></span> | <span data-ttu-id="b285c-992">1.0</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b285c-992">v1.0</span></span> | <span data-ttu-id="b285c-993">Добавлено свойство [onPremisesExtensionAttributes](/graph/api/resources/onpremisesextensionattributes?view=graph-rest-1.0) в объект [User](/graph/api/resources/user?view=graph-rest-1.0), содержащее 15 свойств атрибутов настраиваемых расширений.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b285c-993">Added  [onPremisesExtensionAttributes](/graph/api/resources/onpremisesextensionattributes?view=graph-rest-1.0) property to the [User](/graph/api/resources/user?view=graph-rest-1.0) entity that contains fifteen custom extension attribute properties.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b285c-994">Для пользователя onPremisesSyncEnabled этот набор свойств управляется в локальной службе Active Directory, синхронизирован с Azure AD и доступен только для чтения.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b285c-994">For an onPremisesSyncEnabled user, this set of properties is mastered in on-premises Active Directory and synchronized to Azure AD, and is read-only.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b285c-995">Для исключительно облачных пользователей (где значением для onPremisesSyncEnabled является false) эти свойства можно задать при создании или обновлении.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b285c-995">For a cloud-only user (where onPremisesSyncEnabled is false), these properties may be set during creation or update.</span></span>|
|<span data-ttu-id="b285c-996">Дополнение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b285c-996">Addition</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="b285c-997">1.0</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b285c-997">v1.0</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="b285c-998">Добавлены свойства **onPremisesDomainName**, **onPremisesSamAccountName** и **onPremisesUserPrincipalName** для объекта [User](/graph/api/resources/user?view=graph-rest-1.0)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b285c-998">Added the **onPremisesDomainName**, **onPremisesSamAccountName**, and **onPremisesUserPrincipalName** properties to the [User](/graph/api/resources/user?view=graph-rest-1.0) entity</span></span>|

| <span data-ttu-id="b285c-4601">Дополнение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b285c-4601">Addition</span></span>        | <span data-ttu-id="b285c-4602">Бета</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b285c-4602">Beta</span></span>          | <span data-ttu-id="b285c-4603">Добавлено свойство **locations** для объекта [event](/graph/api/resources/event?view=graph-rest-beta), позволяющее организовать событие, в котором могут участвовать пользователи из нескольких расположений.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b285c-4603">Added the **locations** property to the [event](/graph/api/resources/event?view=graph-rest-beta) entity to support organizing an event that attendees can attend from more than one location.</span></span> |

| <span data-ttu-id="b285c-5344">Дополнение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b285c-5344">Addition</span></span>        | <span data-ttu-id="b285c-5345">1.0</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b285c-5345">v1.0</span></span>          | <span data-ttu-id="b285c-p159">Новый ресурс [schemaExtension](/graph/api/resources/schemaextension?view=graph-rest-1.0) и методы CRUD для управления определениями расширений для следующих ресурсов: [contact](/graph/api/resources/contact?view=graph-rest-1.0), [device](/graph/api/resources/device?view=graph-rest-1.0), [event](/graph/api/resources/event?view=graph-rest-1.0), [group](/graph/api/resources/group?view=graph-rest-1.0), [message](/graph/api/resources/message?view=graph-rest-1.0), [organization](/graph/api/resources/organization?view=graph-rest-1.0), [post](/graph/api/resources/post?view=graph-rest-1.0) и [user](/graph/api/resources/user?view=graph-rest-1.0). Обратите внимание, что объект [administrativeUnit](/graph/api/resources/administrativeunit?view=graph-rest-beta) по-прежнему поддерживается только в бета-версии.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b285c-p159">New resource [schemaExtension](/graph/api/resources/schemaextension?view=graph-rest-1.0) and CRUD methods to manage extension definitions for the following resources: [contact](/graph/api/resources/contact?view=graph-rest-1.0), [device](/graph/api/resources/device?view=graph-rest-1.0), [event](/graph/api/resources/event?view=graph-rest-1.0), [group](/graph/api/resources/group?view=graph-rest-1.0), [message](/graph/api/resources/message?view=graph-rest-1.0), [organization](/graph/api/resources/organization?view=graph-rest-1.0), [post](/graph/api/resources/post?view=graph-rest-1.0), [user](/graph/api/resources/user?view=graph-rest-1.0). Note that support for [administrativeUnit](/graph/api/resources/administrativeunit?view=graph-rest-beta) is still limited to the beta version as before.</span></span> |
| <span data-ttu-id="b285c-5348">Дополнение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b285c-5348">Addition</span></span>        | <span data-ttu-id="b285c-5349">1.0</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b285c-5349">v1.0</span></span>          | <span data-ttu-id="b285c-5350">Существующие методы POST, GET и PATCH ресурсов [contact](/graph/api/resources/contact?view=graph-rest-1.0), [device](/graph/api/resources/device?view=graph-rest-1.0), [event](/graph/api/resources/event?view=graph-rest-1.0), [group](/graph/api/resources/group?view=graph-rest-1.0), [message](/graph/api/resources/message?view=graph-rest-1.0), [organization](/graph/api/resources/organization?view=graph-rest-1.0), [post](/graph/api/resources/post?view=graph-rest-1.0) и [user](/graph/api/resources/user?view=graph-rest-1.0) теперь поддерживают добавление, получение, обновление и удаление пользовательских данных, хранящихся в виде расширений схемы в соответствующих экземплярах ресурсов.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b285c-5350">The existing POST, GET, and PATCH methods of the following resources - [contact](/graph/api/resources/contact?view=graph-rest-1.0), [device](/graph/api/resources/device?view=graph-rest-1.0), [event](/graph/api/resources/event?view=graph-rest-1.0), [group](/graph/api/resources/group?view=graph-rest-1.0), [message](/graph/api/resources/message?view=graph-rest-1.0), [organization](/graph/api/resources/organization?view=graph-rest-1.0), [post](/graph/api/resources/post?view=graph-rest-1.0), [user](/graph/api/resources/user?view=graph-rest-1.0) - now support adding, getting, and updating or deleting custom data stored as schema extensions in the corresponding resource instances.</span></span> |
| <span data-ttu-id="b285c-5351">Дополнение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b285c-5351">Addition</span></span>        | <span data-ttu-id="b285c-5352">1.0 и бета-версия</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b285c-5352">v1.0 and beta</span></span> | <span data-ttu-id="b285c-p160">Теперь вы можете использовать параметр `$filter` для поиска экземпляров ресурсов, свойства которых совпадают с определенным значениями свойств расширений, например имени. Эта возможность рассматривается подробнее в этом [примере](extensibility-schema-groups.md#5-get-a-group-and-its-extension-data).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b285c-p160">You can now use `$filter` to look for resource instances with properties that match specific extension property values, such as extension name. See this [example](extensibility-schema-groups.md#5-get-a-group-and-its-extension-data) for details.</span></span> |
| <span data-ttu-id="b285c-5355">Изменение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b285c-5355">Change</span></span>          | <span data-ttu-id="b285c-5356">1.0 и бета</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b285c-5356">v1.0 and beta</span></span> | <span data-ttu-id="b285c-5357">[Удаление определения расширения схемы](/graph/api/schemaextension-delete?view=graph-rest-1.0) больше не влияет на доступ к пользовательским данным, добавленным на основе этого определения.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b285c-5357">[Deleting a schema extension definition](/graph/api/schemaextension-delete?view=graph-rest-1.0) no longer affects accessing custom data that has been added based on that definition.</span></span> |
| <span data-ttu-id="b285c-5358">Изменение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b285c-5358">Change</span></span>          | <span data-ttu-id="b285c-5359">1.0 и бета</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b285c-5359">v1.0 and beta</span></span> | <span data-ttu-id="b285c-5360">Теперь вы можете задать для сложного типа расширения схемы значение null, чтобы удалить расширение схемы из экземпляра ресурса.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b285c-5360">You can now set a schema extension complex type to null, to remove a schema extension from a resource instance.</span></span> |

С его помощью можно получать отчеты об использовании служб Office 365 сотрудниками компании. Например, вы можете определить, кто использует службу по максимуму, а кому вообще не нужна лицензия Office 365. Дополнительные сведения см. в статье о ресурсе [report](/graph/api/resources/report?view=graph-rest-beta).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b285c-p175">Introduced the new preview API for Office 365 Reports. You can use it to get usage reports of how people in your business are using Office 365 services. For example, you can identify who is using a service a lot and reaching quotas, or who may not need an Office 365 license at all. For more details, see [report](/graph/api/resources/report?view=graph-rest-beta).</span></span> |

| <span data-ttu-id="b285c-6913">**Тип изменения**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b285c-6913">**Change type**</span></span> | <span data-ttu-id="b285c-6914">**Версия**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b285c-6914">**Version**</span></span> | <span data-ttu-id="b285c-6915">**Описание**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b285c-6915">**Description**</span></span>                          |
| :-------------- | :---------- | :--------------------------------------- |
| <span data-ttu-id="b285c-6916">Дополнение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b285c-6916">Addition</span></span>        | <span data-ttu-id="b285c-6917">Бета</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b285c-6917">Beta</span></span>        | <span data-ttu-id="b285c-p191">Теперь REST API управления привилегированными пользователями доступны в конечной точке Microsoft Graph (бета-версия). [Управление привилегированными пользователями](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/active-directory/privileged-identity-management/pim-configure) обеспечивает активацию "точно в срок" для привилегированных ролей в организации Azure AD, например ролей глобального администратора, администратора выставления счетов и т. д. C помощью опубликованных API разработчики могут создавать приложения, которые получают и обновляют привилегированные роли и активируют роли для пользователей. Дополнительные сведения см. в статьях [Microsoft Graph: доступна бета-версия API для Azure AD Privileged Identity Management](https://developer.microsoft.com/office/blogs/microsoft-graph-azure-ad-privileged-identity-management-apis-beta/) и [Azure AD Privileged Identity Management](/graph/api/resources/privilegedidentitymanagement-root?view=graph-rest-beta).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b285c-p191">Privileged Identity Management (PIM) REST APIs now are available in the Microsoft Graph beta endpoint. [Privileged Identity Management](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/active-directory/privileged-identity-management/pim-configure) provides just in time activation for privileged Azure AD organizational roles such as Global Administrator, Billing Administrator, and so on. You can use the published APIs to write applications that retrieve and update privileged role assignments, and activate users into roles. For details, see [Microsoft Graph: Azure AD Privileged Identity Management Preview APIs available in Beta](https://developer.microsoft.com/office/blogs/microsoft-graph-azure-ad-privileged-identity-management-apis-beta/) and [Azure AD Privileged Identity Management](/graph/api/resources/privilegedidentitymanagement-root?view=graph-rest-beta).</span></span> |

| <span data-ttu-id="b285c-7038">Дополнение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b285c-7038">Addition</span></span>        | <span data-ttu-id="b285c-7039">Бета</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b285c-7039">Beta</span></span>          | <span data-ttu-id="b285c-p198">Теперь Azure Active Directory используется в качестве резервного ресурса для запросов /beta/users/id/photo, когда приложению Outlook не удается обслужить запрос (например, когда у пользователя нет лицензии на почтовый ящик или у клиента нет подписки на Exchange Online). ПРИМЕЧАНИЕ. Этот резервный ресурс доступен и для запросов GET, и для запросов PATCH.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b285c-p198">Azure Active Directory is now used as a fallback for /beta/users/id/photo requests when Outlook is unable to service the request, for example when the user has no mailbox license or the tenant does not have an Exchange Online subscription. NOTE: this fallback is available for both GET and PATCH.</span></span> |

### <a name="drive"></a><span data-ttu-id="b285c-7076">Drive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b285c-7076">Drive</span></span>

| <span data-ttu-id="b285c-7077">**Тип изменения**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b285c-7077">**Change type**</span></span> | <span data-ttu-id="b285c-7078">**Версия**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b285c-7078">**Version**</span></span>   | <span data-ttu-id="b285c-7079">**Описание**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b285c-7079">**Description**</span></span>                          |
| :-------------- | :------------ | :--------------------------------------- |
| <span data-ttu-id="b285c-7080">Дополнение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b285c-7080">Addition</span></span>        | <span data-ttu-id="b285c-7081">1.0 и бета-версия</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b285c-7081">v1.0 and beta</span></span> | <span data-ttu-id="b285c-p200">Добавлена функция _recent_ для вывода списка элементов, которые недавно использовал пользователь, вошедший в систему. Этот список включает элементы, находящиеся на диске пользователя, а также элементы на других дисках, к которым у пользователя есть доступ. Пример: GET /me/drive/recent.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b285c-p200">Added _recent_ function to list a set of items that have been recently used by the signed in user. This list includes items that are in the user's drive as well as items they have access tofrom other drives. Example: GET /me/drive/recent.</span></span> |
| <span data-ttu-id="b285c-7085">Дополнение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b285c-7085">Addition</span></span>        | <span data-ttu-id="b285c-7086">1.0 и бета-версия</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b285c-7086">v1.0 and beta</span></span> | <span data-ttu-id="b285c-p201">Добавлена функция _sharedWithMe_ для вывода списка элементов, доступ к которым предоставлен текущему пользователю. Пример: GET /me/drive/sharedWithMe.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b285c-p201">Added _sharedWithMe_ function to list the set of items that are shared with the current user. Example: GET /me/drive/sharedWithMe.</span></span> |

Example: POST /me/drive/items/{item-id}/copy.</span></span> |
| <span data-ttu-id="b285c-7107">Дополнение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b285c-7107">Addition</span></span>        | <span data-ttu-id="b285c-7108">1.0 и бета-версия</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b285c-7108">v1.0 and beta</span></span> | <span data-ttu-id="b285c-7109">Атрибуты экземпляра _conflictBehavior_ теперь можно применять к _driveItem_.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b285c-7109">_conflictBehavior_ instance attributes is now applicable to _driveItem_.</span></span> |
|<span data-ttu-id="b285c-7110">Дополнение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b285c-7110">Addition</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="b285c-7111">Бета</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b285c-7111">Beta</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="b285c-p204">Добавлена функция _invite_, которая позволяет отправить приглашение к совместному использованию для существующего элемента. Приглашение к совместному использованию создает уникальную ссылку для совместного доступа и отправляет ее получателю приглашения. Пример: POST /drive/items/{item-id}/invite</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b285c-p204">Added _invite_ function to send a sharing invitation to an existing item. A sharing invitation creates a unique sharing link and sends an email to the recipient of the invitation that includes the sharing link. Example: POST /drive/items/{item-id}/invite.</span></span>

### <a name="excel"></a><span data-ttu-id="b285c-7135">Excel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b285c-7135">Excel</span></span>

| <span data-ttu-id="b285c-7136">**Тип изменения**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b285c-7136">**Change type**</span></span> | <span data-ttu-id="b285c-7137">**Версия**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b285c-7137">**Version**</span></span> | <span data-ttu-id="b285c-7138">**Описание**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b285c-7138">**Description**</span></span>                          |
| :-------------- | :---------- | :--------------------------------------- |
| <span data-ttu-id="b285c-7139">Дополнение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b285c-7139">Addition</span></span>        | <span data-ttu-id="b285c-7140">Бета</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b285c-7140">Beta</span></span>        | <span data-ttu-id="b285c-p205">Мы добавляем новые REST API Excel, которые позволяют считывать и изменять данные в рабочей книге Excel. Теперь вы можете создавать интеллектуальные приложения, с помощью которых пользователи смогут эффективно анализировать содержимое, хранящееся в рабочих книгах Excel. Используйте аналитические функции Excel, создавайте таблицы и визуально привлекательные диаграммы в своем приложении. Дополнительные сведения см. в статье [Работа с Excel в Microsoft Graph](/graph/api/resources/excel?view=graph-rest-beta).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b285c-p205">We are adding new Excel REST APIs that let you read and modify data in an Excel workbook. It is now possible to build smart apps that allows users to get value out of the content stored in an Excel workbook by providing insights into the data. Take advantage of analytical powers of Excel, create tables and charts and extract visually appealing chart image - all from within your app. For details, see [Working with Excel in Microsoft Graph](/graph/api/resources/excel?view=graph-rest-beta).</span></span> |

### <a name="general"></a><span data-ttu-id="b285c-7145">Общие</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b285c-7145">General</span></span>

| <span data-ttu-id="b285c-7146">**Тип изменения**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b285c-7146">**Change type**</span></span> | <span data-ttu-id="b285c-7147">**Версия**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b285c-7147">**Version**</span></span>   | <span data-ttu-id="b285c-7148">**Описание**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b285c-7148">**Description**</span></span>                          |
| :-------------- | :------------ | :--------------------------------------- |
| <span data-ttu-id="b285c-7149">Дополнение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b285c-7149">Addition</span></span>        | <span data-ttu-id="b285c-7150">1.0 и бета-версия</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b285c-7150">v1.0 and beta</span></span> | <span data-ttu-id="b285c-7151">Улучшено сообщение об ошибке при сопоставлении псевдонима клиента и отклоненных токенов JWT (AAD).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b285c-7151">Improved error message when resolving tenant alias and rejected JWT (AAD) tokens.</span></span> |
| <span data-ttu-id="b285c-7152">Дополнение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b285c-7152">Addition</span></span>        | <span data-ttu-id="b285c-7153">1.0 и бета-версия</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b285c-7153">v1.0 and beta</span></span> | <span data-ttu-id="b285c-7154">Сведения о расположении конечной точки службы авторизации теперь возвращаются в заголовке _www-authenticate_ при получении запроса с пустым токеном носителя.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b285c-7154">The location of the authorization service endpoint is now returned in the _www-authenticate_ header when a request is received with an empty bearer token.</span></span> |
| <span data-ttu-id="b285c-7155">Дополнение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b285c-7155">Addition</span></span>        | <span data-ttu-id="b285c-7156">1.0 и бета-версия</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b285c-7156">v1.0 and beta</span></span> | <span data-ttu-id="b285c-7157">Исправлена возможность фильтрации по свойству id объекта.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b285c-7157">The ability to filter on an entity's id property is now fixed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b285c-7158">Пример: GET https://graph.microsoft.com/v1.0/users?$filter=id+eq+'x'</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b285c-7158">Example: GET https://graph.microsoft.com/v1.0/users?$filter=id+eq+'x'</span></span><br/><span data-ttu-id="b285c-7159">Ранее в запросах POST требовалось добавлять microsoft.graph перед именем функции или действия.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b285c-7159">Previously, any POST requests to service actions and functions require prefixing the action or function name with the microsoft.graph prefix.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b285c-7160">Пример: POST https://graph.microsoft.com/v1.0/me/Microsoft.Graph.getMemberGroups.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b285c-7160">For example: POST https://graph.microsoft.com/v1.0/me/Microsoft.Graph.getMemberGroups.</span></span><br/><span data-ttu-id="b285c-7161">Теперь не требуется указывать префикс (хотя его по-прежнему можно указывать).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b285c-7161">The prefix is now no longer required (although it can still be specified).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b285c-7162">Такой запрос тоже возможен: POST https://graph.microsoft.com/v1.0/me/getMemberGroups.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b285c-7162">So the following would now also work: POST https://graph.microsoft.com/v1.0/me/getMemberGroups.</span></span> |
| <span data-ttu-id="b285c-7163">Изменение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b285c-7163">Change</span></span>          | <span data-ttu-id="b285c-7164">Бета</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b285c-7164">Beta</span></span>          | <span data-ttu-id="b285c-7165">Удалены имена свойств подписок.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b285c-7165">Cleaned up subscription property names.</span></span>  |
| <span data-ttu-id="b285c-7166">Дополнение</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b285c-7166">Addition</span></span>        | <span data-ttu-id="b285c-7167">Бета</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b285c-7167">Beta</span></span>          | <span data-ttu-id="b285c-p209">Мы добавили возможность находить (с помощью _directorySettingTemplates_) и переопределять поведение по умолчанию (путем создания _setting_ на основе шаблона) для объектов и связанных с ними функций. Изначально для управления поведением групп Office использовался только этот шаблон.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b285c-p209">We've added the capability to discover (through _directorySettingTemplates_) and override the default behavior (by creating a _setting_ from the template) for entities and their associated functionality. Initially this only template provided is to control behaviors on Office groups.</span></span> |
